ygData.subject: Re: Loosing exp when dying
ygData.msgSnippet: This is just a guess but i think its your level that is used to calculate. It seems that the higher you are the more experience you lose.  You dont lose any
ygData.messageBody:
This is just a guess but i think its your level that is used to calculate.
It seems that the higher you are the more experience you lose. You dont
lose any until you reach lvl 5, after that it seems to increase with each
lvl.

Lance

-----Original Message-----
From: scott@... [mailto:scott@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 10:13 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Loosing exp when dying


From: scott@...

I saw someone write somewhere that the exp you loose depends on the monster
that kills you. Such as if you die from a monster that is many levels below
you, you loose more exp. Is this true?

Azboklin the enchanter
